articles.title: 'It feels like we let our country down': US women’s hockey team falls to Canada in gold medal game at Beijing Winter Olympics - USA TODAY
articles.description: Canada jumped out to a 3-0 lead and held on for a 3-2 victory over the U.S. to capture the women's hockey gold medal. The Americans take silver.
articles.content:
BEIJING — The waiting is not intended to be cruel, but it is.
